DataElement.preferredName: Image Study Admitting Diagnosis Description 64 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to capture a description of the admitting diagnosis (diagnoses) of a patient/participant.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A radiographic technique used to evaluate a specific anatomic location for a specific purpose.

Concepts.definition: A radiographic technique used to evaluate a specific anatomic location for a specific purpose.

Property.preferredDefinition: The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

Concepts.definition: The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/17/09 superseded DEC to reflect change from clinical study to image study OC per VCDE NCIA interim report.  12/9/08 - released post VCDE Interim Silver Review changes.  6/6/07 -DEC created to support DICOM CDE task utilizing IE; DICOM Attribute terms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/30/13 added DICOM RT CSI. jc 3/16/09 - set min length from 0 to 1. 2007 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6 2006 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 6/17/09 superseded CDE/DEC to reflect change from clinical study to image study OC per VCDE NCIA interim report.  12/9/08 - released post VCDE Interim Silver Review changes.  6/25/07 -CDE versioned to support DICOM CDE IE - DICOM Attribute-DICOM VR Rep term format.;  3/22/07 - Assigned CDEs to DICOM-Review Set 1 CSI
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 1/1/24 Added CDS Imaging Alt Def.  CDS CSI and Alt name already added. jk
